common.messages

Class CommonMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.messages.Message
      • common.messages.CommonMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KVMessage, java.io.Serializable

    public class CommonMessage
extends Message
implements java.io.Serializable, KVMessage
    Represents a simple text message, which is intended to be received and sent by the server.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns an array of bytes that represent the ASCII coded message content.

      • getStatus

        public KVMessage.StatusType getStatus()
        Specified by:
        getStatus in interface KVMessage
        Returns:
        a status string that is used to identify request types, response types and error types associated to the message.

      • setStatusType

        public void setStatusType(KVMessage.StatusType type)

      • serialize

        public CommonMessage serialize()
        Serializes the data of the current TextMessage into a String with format {StatusType: , key: , value: } and returns the result in a new TextMessage
        Returns:
        Serialized String ready for sending to the server.

      • deserialize

        public CommonMessage deserialize()
        Deserializes a String received from the server. The message {StatusType: , key: , value: } is split into its values and a new TextMessage with these values is returned.
        Returns:
        TextMessage with received Status, Key and Value

        public Metadata getMetadata()

      • setMetadata

        public void setMetadata(Metadata metadata)
